ecological.title: Real-Time Ecological Savings
ecological.subtitle: Electronic Signatures
ecological.description: Automatic environmental impact tracking with systematic data updates. No manual refresh needed!
ecological.systemDescription: Data automatically syncs from your e-signature platform using systematic cron jobs. Calculations based on
ecological.calculationFormula: Sign requests × Document sheets × (Contacts to sign + Contacts in copy) = Total pages saved
